website_summaries.verdict: Versatile option that leaves hair looking great whatever your style, but avoiding burns can be a challenge.
pros: Delivers ionic technology that makes locks shiny and smooth
Heats fast and glides through hair with ease
Curls as well as it straightens
cons: A few units quit working after a few months of use
Fiddly design results in burns if you aren't careful

customer_reviews.title: wow wow wow!! (but there is a but)
customer_reviews.text: GH who?? Honestly.. it puts my GHD platinum and my Steampod TO SHAME. Excellent pair of straightners.. hair is shine and frizz free... HOWEVER... stars were lost to the metal body.. be ready to burn your forehead and ears.. I've been using straighteners for 20 years now, the very first ones on the 90's and i don't know what where they thinking by making the outside of metal. Accidents waiting to happen.. it can burn your scalp as well.. so make sure you can handle a straightener well otherwise stick to GHD's that offer more protection.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's perfect to curl the hair as well.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Heat up really quick and is perfect for making curls as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ludhika

customer_reviews.title: Good in general
customer_reviews.text: First of all I'm glad it came with a convenient hear resistant mat. Secondly, it's a good straightener, I have naturally curly hair that can look frizzy, but this leaves my hair looking nice and smooth. As for the curling part, it does curl the hair, but it it can be difficult to curl it at times and can take time to master it. The curls don't seem to last long either, but it might just be the way my hair is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont recomand
customer_reviews.text: The design is very bad ..there u cant see the real temperature ...cause no display...and also when she start to rich the temperature u can hear a strange sound
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good. But not the best babyliss straighteners I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Always used Babyliss straighteners for as long as I remember. I had the elegance previously. These don't seem as good strangely. I have dry but fine hair so use the top heat on first day and possibly try to use no more than twice a week. They work for my hair type but on hot. Other brands don't work Full case heats up so hard to remember not to get to close or touch. This is for the curling option. Love the different heat levels. Long cord on swivel. Got these to have the option of curl too.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good for even an amateur!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always shied away from reviews however these are amazing and need to be celebrated!! I struggle to curl with straighteners as I can’t perfect the twist / pull technique. These are fantastic because of the heated tong/straightener which allows you so much choice of style !! Well worth the gamble of a purchase - it worked out for me !! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: hilary macleod

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: How amazing are these. As somebody who has always stuck to ghd due to wild thick and curly hair I though I would give these a go after reading the reviews. They are amazing change the temperature depending on sleekness required. They go through my hair with ease. The price is extremely reasonable for what you get. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Best Straighteners I've had
customer_reviews.text: I can safely say these are the best straighteners ever! I have pretty much always used Babyliss but this particular pair is so much better! So easy to use and super quick warm up. I was finally able to curl my hair with straighteners and don't have to rely on my hairdresser for it anymore. I have a lot of hair but the curling took half the time it normally takes with a curling wand. Another massive plus is when I straighten my hair it lasts 2 days and no touch ups needed as I would have done in the past. Definitely best value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Iliyana

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on another website £20 more expensive. It came well packaged and good instructions. I have very fine hair and this item has held its curl. Bought product so I only have to take one item on holiday and 3 items. The heat mat is a an added bonus and will use for covering so wont damage the rod while packing. Certainly glad I paid £20 less for this product and would recommend. I only buy BaByliss hair products.
customer_reviews.author: Miss J. L. Hynes

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product. I have wild hair that is hard ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I have wild hair that is hard to tame. I have tried many different straighteners including the brand leaders. This is the best I have used to date. Great for straightening and curling. Heats up quickly. Smooths hair beautifully. Reduces frizz. A good, if not better than professional straighteners twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Star

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product but be careful not to burn yourself.
customer_reviews.text: I have natural 4C hair and this has been by far one of the best hair straighteners I have ever used. It had honestly given me better results than this I get in the salon. I have given 4 stars instead of 5 because this hair straightener hears up really quickly and you have to be careful not to burn yourself on it. Also, do not use it on the highest heat setting as I did get a little heat damage when I first used and thought I needed high heat to straighten my hair properly. I have since used it on the middle setting which works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase unlike many expensive brands.
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. the best purchase I've ever made for any hair styling tools/ equipment. This straight and curl iron is brill. My hair is extremely difficult to hold a curl of any sort and this did an amazing job unlike any other curlind wands.. ceramic thick barrel tongs .. ghd's etc etc.. tried them all and these are the best by far holds the curl in all day/night. Your hair glides therough the plates with no pulling or snagging. These are also brill for straightening hair too without reptiotion of each section. Well woth the money.
customer_reviews.author: j.mcevoy

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile and amazing straightener!
customer_reviews.text: I use this straightener every week, is so fast and versatile, you can use it to just straightener your hair or to curling it! And is particularly good while curling because it heated both sides of the plates so you need to be careful while using it to avoid burning yourself, but you can always use the gloves that comes with it and be safe. In Summary this product is amazing to me and my needs and I would really recommend it to anyone looking for a good and powerful straightener to make either curlies or straighten it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Castro

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I can straighten and curl my kinky Afro hair without damaging natural curl pattern. I don’t straighten or curl my hair often (once or twice a year, if at all) I used this and it did not damage my hair and it also didn’t burn my hair. I only wished this came with a heat repellent glove as I have burnt my hands on the otter part of the straightener.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Recommend..
customer_reviews.text: bought on Boxing Day discount (£35 instead of around £130) - Thank god I never paid full price or I’d be sooo disappointed! They look great, but are very impractical to use.. the outer bit of the straighter gets scorching hot that you cannot but the straighteners anywhere near your face without burning it. Have ended up with 3 bad burns so far and that’s only for using level 2/5 heat setting!! They also catch your hair in the plates causing it to rip. Really unhappy with them unfortunately and have already ordered new ones in less than 4 weeks. The only and I mean only good thing about them is the heat settings.. otherwise I dont recommend at all!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!!
customer_reviews.text: Worlds worst design, the outside is so hot I’ve burnt myself many times, on my ears, face and neck. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: This straightener is a dream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this straightener because my 10-year-old one took ages to heat up and the ceramic protection was coming off too. This straightener however, is a dream to use, heats upvery quickly and my hair goes so soft after straightening, I really like the design too. I would definitely recomment it!
customer_reviews.author: Reka Faggyas

customer_reviews.title: Great straightner/curler
customer_reviews.text: I managed to get this at a very reduced price in the January sales, so it's always so much better when you get a bargain! I would have been wary paying full price for them, as I'd probably have considered buying a different brand. Saying that, I have had other BaByliss products that have been really good. These heat up well and straighten my hair nicely. I've managed to curl one side well so no doubt with using them for curling, I just need to practice more on the other side!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had these strainers for Christmas. I’ve only just had chance to use them but was actually amazed with them. I’ve had GHDs and Cloud Nine straighteners in the past and have never managed to make my hair curly with them. I kinda asked for these with no great expectations of them as they were so cheap. I can honestly say they are by far the best I’ve ever had. I curled my hair for the first time with them and they actually worked. Beautiful shiny curls 😍. Just goes to show you don’t always have to pay a high price. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: HOT HOT HOT ! And useless
customer_reviews.text: If you have really curly hair, forget about it. It didn’t straighten nor did curls. I had an old babyliss straightener for 10 years and the new one is useless. Had to use my old curling tongs. But the worse is that it’s so hot !! Should’ve listened to the reviews !
customer_reviews.author: Petru

customer_reviews.title: Great for curling
customer_reviews.text: They look expensive and are really light to hold. The heat protectant Matt is very basic compared to the look and quality of the straighteners, it doesn’t have a brand logo on and feels very cheap. I brought these mainly to curl my hair and they do a fab job, the little rubber covers that come with the straighteners could do with being bigger, as they do Slip off sometimes. I don’t think they get very hot as the heat is distributed to the whole end rather than just the plates so that’s the only disadvantage.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Great just does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I don’t like! Straighten hair or curl. For the price I would recommend. My hair is thick and they manage to straighten.Ends get hot so 2 rubber ends are supplied to stop burning fingers.Also to remember they get very hot ALL AROUND .
customer_reviews.author: J. LOWE

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a handful of times and the outside of the plates are getting hot but not the inner plates so not straightening hair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than GHD in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Really love this straightener, also love that it can curl too. Easy to use once you remember that the barrel is hot and creates long lasting styles.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: The straightener become extremely hot so if you are changing from a cold backed pair be careful.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a set of cordless BaByliss for donkeys years which gave up the ghost, unable to replace with a similar model I bought these straighteners. They are not cold backs so I keep burning myself and I find they catch and pull my hair, the control panel also seems to stay warm once switched off so I always unplug them. They do have a long lead and a swivel connection as a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these hair straighteners/curlers! Only tiny issue is that the little rubber grips that you put on the end occasionally fall off so I have caught my fingers a couple of times. Not enough of a problem for me not to love them though!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: After delivery problems and eventually receiving this item was very 😥
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the lock button on the straighteners where it is as I kept easily accidently kept locking them which became annoying, and felt the plates didnt glide as nice as expected and odd hair felt being pulled! Expected a nice poker straight shine as a straightener but was disappointed for the price of these were, have used cheaper and had a better result.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazed 🌈
customer_reviews.text: I love this straightener so much it inspires me to create amazing hairstyles without thinking of going to hair saloon. My hair is hard to get straightened and on each strand of hair I would have to pass it 4 times but with this straightener is so much easier with only 1 pass or 2 max.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Augusto

customer_reviews.title: OK straighteners
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 stars as they were on offer otherwise they are expensive Still getting used to them but slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Christine J

customer_reviews.title: Best straightener I had so far.
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of use I must say that is the best straightener I've ever had.It heats up really quickly and straight my hair at no time.Doing curls takes a little practice but overall I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Good curls, too hot to touch!
customer_reviews.text: These get really hot!! They do a really good curl, way better than my GHDs to curl.. my only problem is; they get really hot, to make a good curl that you can't touch the tip of the wand. They do provide small rubber tips to put on your finger and thumb, personally perfair a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my head
customer_reviews.text: Really good for curling hair.. do take care as outside of the blades do get very hot and I burnt my forehead. Other than that I do love them
customer_reviews.author: kirstXxx

customer_reviews.title: Really hot. GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and really hot. Can work well on afro Caribbean hair like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Makes a really good curl of you know what you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: kelly hoyland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the wife she loves it says it works really well
customer_reviews.author: Matt Walker

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and it makes a weird noise whenever I turn them on. Sounds like they are going to brake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if faulty or just an awful product.
customer_reviews.text: Tried curling my hair and it lost the bounce straightaway - waste of money for me unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair straightners
customer_reviews.text: Hi boughtt hair straighteners for Christmas for my girlfriend she was very happy with them until they have gone faulty only 2minths old heating up and cooling down this is not a good product and would like to return them back as they can not be used faulty
customer_reviews.author: Colin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: Ok but would have been better paying extra to get Cloud 9 instead.
customer_reviews.author: L A Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Straightening made easy
customer_reviews.text: I’m converted! I’m 50 and have never used straightens - true fact! These are great easy to use and do exactly what it says on the box. Haven’t managed the curling bit yet
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Parker

customer_reviews.title: It's very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, made my hair very silky and smooth 10/10 recommend! My hair is very curly so it did a great job straightening it only concern is it can be very smokey. After straightening my hair my room was smokey but i guess thats with most straighteners
customer_reviews.author: mia mo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who has curly hair she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother for curls.
customer_reviews.text: Half an hour to get one curl out of fine, no shampoo hair on max setting. Fell out within minutes. Using cloth twists on damp to dry hair and no product I can usually get 10h of curl. Definitely a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Oeisha

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant straightener, works so well and protect me hair
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant straightener , works so well and protect me hair ,never had better before ,highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Ok Straightener
customer_reviews.text: The Straightener broke down 2 weeks post its return date. Absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Himanshu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent curls. So easy to use. Different temperatures allow for loose or tighter curls. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Item doesnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this item, it doesnt work at all. Its defective, i lost money and time, now i have to return it , and i have to spend more money and time for it. Never buying again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Stela

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing straighteners! My hair is so smooth. Wish I bought them sooner
customer_reviews.author: jo..jo

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing because I can make my hair straight or curly easily and also I can adjust the temperature that don't damaged my hair. The color is so beautiful! I really recommend
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything, very good, just for first time be careful because it’s hot😅 and has strange sound but it’s normal as I understood. One of the best items which one I both these year 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for curls
customer_reviews.text: Theses are excellent just be careful when using, u need the plastic tips to hold them, as they get very hot on the outsides. Overall brilliant for curling hair
customer_reviews.author: DoreenMcConville

customer_reviews.title: Very good for value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very good for straightening and curls. I am using it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, very curly hair and these glide through my hair with easy & leave me with silky, straight hair
customer_reviews.author: Laura Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Worth every peny.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect iron. VERY fast heating. VERY gentle to the hair. Worth every peny.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Staal

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: i thought they were to long to hold when they are on they make a noise aswell which don't sound good don't overall i wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: kate mee

customer_reviews.title: Lock sticks during use
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing other than the fact that the lock locks during use somehow? It’s very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Babyliss straightener
customer_reviews.text: Best hair straightener ever, I’m a hairdresser and I can do anything with this
customer_reviews.author: Ms D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great only keep your head clean and hair don't get pulled
customer_reviews.author: j kirpluks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing straighteners !!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a few weeks .. I am so impressed.. they really work so well and my hair feels amazing .. so happy I brought Therese .. worth the money ... loving it
customer_reviews.author: Eni232

customer_reviews.title: Best straighteners I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I can straighten and curl my hair with these. I’ve had GHDs for years but these are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. Hampson

customer_reviews.title: It works and it works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second "no-named" webcam I have bought in the past couple of weeks. This one works. Without a name associated with the product, it is hard to tell you what brand is good. But for what I need this is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Like the case, but 3 failures due to poor plastic
customer_reviews.text: I have had three of these cases so far. I really like the style, but they have all cracked on the latch that holds the phone in the case. Apparently the manufacturer does not use plastic that holds up to the repeated flexing that the latch takes. This most recent case I bought April 22 and it did not even last six months! When the latch breaks, the case is obviously totally useless. Being that this happened three times, all with the same issue, I recommend looking for a different case, and probably stay away from this manufacturer entirely due to them using a plastic not suitable for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: LieutenantColumbo

customer_reviews.title: Significant Interference with Microphone!
customer_reviews.text: Review of: This case has several nice features, it's fairly slim, should provide very good protection from drops, add a bit of water-resistance - BUT None of that matters because no one can hear you! I used this case for two weeks, and although I really liked it for myself, everyone I spoke to had to ask me to repeat what I had said. Whether using speakerphone or not - I had consistent complaints from family, friends, business associates, and even when ordering take-out. As soon as I switched to my bluetooth headset - everyone said they could finally hear me. I returned the case and bought an Otterbox. No more microphone issues.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a bit difficult to get the phone case on and off the holster quickly, it does a good job of protecting the phone and is not bulky like most protective cases on the market. UPDATE: After using the clip for several months and inserting/removing the phone from the holster, one of the tabs that holds the phone on the holster broke off. Contacted the company to see if they sold the clip separately and they requested a photo of the broken holster and an explanation of how/why it may have broken. Sadly, I had already thrown away the broken holster. The case is still in perfect working condition.
customer_reviews.author: O. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for iPhone SE or 5S
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for the iPhone SE or 5S. Everything snaps together secirely with no gaps or loose areas. The installed screen protector has never given me any issues, and doesn’t hamper visibility at all. You can, of course, remove it and install a tempered glass protector insert if you prefer.... but I don’t feel like it is necessary. I like that the case is significantly thinner than the OtterBox and at a fraction of the price. Definitely recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: SBJ

customer_reviews.title: Much better than otter box!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's birthday and he absolutely loves it. the protective cover over the screen is absolutely great! No more mashing your fingers down to press buttons. The screen protector is directly on top of the screen and doesn't move at all like most cases do after a few days. The charger port covers are solid and don't pop open on their own. MUCH THINNER case than the picture shows. The picture does NOT do it justice. It absolutely does not look as bulky as it does in the photo. Also noted, the rubber around the edge is matte and is not the same squishy rubber as otter boxes. Slides SO MUCH EASIER into your pocket. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Carin

customer_reviews.title: Phone case worth a try
customer_reviews.text: This phone case is extremely nice. I purchased it because my otterbox after a few drops was finally breaking. I looked for a better phone case and did not want to spend the money on a lifeproof case. The price and reviews made this product worth a try. I have zero complaints. The rainbow effect you might read about is in compliance to the screen protector is based on its contact with the phone. If you have an air pocket you will have the rainbow effect. The port covers are great but if you aren't worried about dust. Cut them off and you still have a great phone case! This is a definite phone case I am going to keep.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: They work great but eventfully the clip that holds the phone breaks
customer_reviews.text: They work great but eventfully the clip that holds the phone breaks. I use one for a second company phone and they both break within a week on one another. looks like life span is about 8 months. There is a faint molding mark by the clip, that appears to be the sweet spot that breaks, could just be point of most force. I still will purchase and use, better that anything else I have found for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff E

customer_reviews.title: Only slightly disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 2 year old Otterbox defender in hopes it would be more "pocket" friendly so time will tell... Seems to be good protection although it has one less layer of protection. Would've given 5 stars but the silence button cover will not stay closed. A slight concern about in out of my pocket several times a day. Update! Bought another one for the wife. She has been using Otterbox for years and swore she'd never stray.. Once she realized that the protection is superior with the Supcase she was sold. The smaller size makes carrying her IPhone much easier in and out of her pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Better than Defender.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I'm a longtime Otter Box user for previous phones, Defender and Commuter, and I like this case much more. Just as protective, yet slimmer. I believe the built-in screen guard is actually superior. I used to cut the one out of the Defender because it wouldn't seal against the screen, and would get little air bubbles. No such problem with this one. The belt clip is sturdy and easy to use. Sidenote: The little flap covering the mute switch doesn't seem to close completely flush on mine, but it doesn't really bother me. It's kinda hard for me to get my sausage fingers in there anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Kotoff

customer_reviews.title: 2 years so far...good case!
customer_reviews.text: I like this case alot. It is slimmer than Otterbox cases by a little bit and I've found that this protects your phone better too. I drop my phone all the time, and after 2 years the results are in. The case did it's job extremely well for it's cost. I think that it looks better than most other iPhone cases that are on the market. It has a plastic screen protecting the phone from cosmetic damage, so you won't need a screen protector ever again. The only issues I have with it is dust. Dust will get into the speaker, touch ID, and camera area, so be sure to clean it should it bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Love this iPhone case!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have struggled with cases that wouldn't work well with my iPhone. After several failed attempts, this Supcase is the winning ticket for me. It is the perfect combination of form, function, AND Affordability. You can pay a whole lot more for a big name super case, but you won't get more than you will with this case. Great feature: LOVE the design of the belt clip. It is thoughtfully designed with a shorter top of the clip handle. This means that the belt clip won't jab you in the waist when you sit down or drive a car. For the price and function, this case is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MaxPW500

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and stylish
customer_reviews.text: As described and have been very happy with this. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.G

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm very happy with this case
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very happy with this case. It's light weight, feels very solid, and the clear screen protector hasn't affected the use of my tough screen. The one issue I'm having is with the flap that covers the toggle to turn the phone to vibrate. It doesn't want to stay closed. The flaps on the bottom that cover the charging connector and audio jack are perfect and securely close. Is only an issue when I pull the phone out of my pocket. I'm hoping over time the flap will loosen up a bit and stay closed. The case also comes with a clip you can add to your belt. Just in case you're a hip middle aged dad.
customer_reviews.author: Evn

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to protect his first smart phone. This has absolutely got to be the best phone case I’ve ever seen. It fits the phone well and constructed very well. I can’t imagine anything happening to his phone with this case on it. The only thing is the belt clip would not rotate at all. I contacted the seller who immediately (and I mean like within minutes) sent a replacement which we received today, only 3 days from contacting the seller. AMAZING customer service! Whenever anyone in my family needs a phone case, you can bet it’ll be this one. Please make one in rose gold because I’m going to need one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drop this phone every week and this case keeps me 1000% protected, it is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The best case ever. I have had it for a year now and have dropped this phone multiple times each week. All of those drops are on hard floors, concrete, porcelain tiles and other horrific surfaces. This case is amazing, no issues at all. It definitely makes the phone thicker looking but it does a really the job. I have also gone running with case and had no issues with sweat. I have had to run with some drizzle and had no issues. Other then dumping this case into water, this case will keep your phone virtually unbreakable.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl c.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Otterbox!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second Supcase Unicorn Beetle Pro Series Heavy Duty case we have purchased. My husband loves them! They are very comparable to the OtterBox cases for a fraction of the price. My husband is HARD on his cases, and has snapped the Holster several times. After replacing the OtterBox a few times, it was Supcase to the rescue for a more cost effective option. It also is much slimmer and lighter. Highly recommend, and will purchase again. Also, from the little experience I have had with both companies, Supcase customer service seems easier to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Princess BoB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality case. Very rugged, but not overly bulky (for this sort or case). Can really take a hit. Ports and buttons easily accessible. I've repurposed an old iPhone 5 as a kids' music player and this is the perfect case to handle the abuse. And the attached screen protector means you don't have to deal with buying and applying a separate screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: The materials are excellent. It's a tight fit and some patience is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Otterboxes for almost 10 years now. Never again. I purchased a SupCase for a new Kindle I had gotten and was so impressed with it that I had to get one for my iPhone. The fit is phenomenal. The materials are excellent. It's a tight fit and some patience is needed to make sure that dust and whatnot does not get between the phone and screen protector, but it can be done. Absolutely pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Better than Otter
customer_reviews.text: I've had two Otter boxes before ordering this case. I am very impressed with the slimmer fit and the feel of the case. It's not rubber nor is it hard plastic, somewhere in between. It also has the same cover flaps for the mute switch, the charging slot and the earplug hole. I think this is a much better case than Otter and less expensive. It also has 6 small rubber feet on the back that should keep it from sliding on hard surfaces although it will slide under slight pressure. It should protect the phone from rain etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in California

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality case that offers excellent protection and a great price. I invested in an unlocked iPhone 5S and so the expense was several hundred $$$ more than a contract phone. I intend to keep this phone for many years and want a durable case that will protect my investment. I did do a slight modification in that I removed the included screen protector because I have a ballistic glass screen protector on my phone. I recommend this case to anyone who is serious about protecting their phone without paying ridiculous amounts of $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Case...Probably the Best
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. I use it with my iPhone 5 and it fits like a glove. I prefer this case over the Otterbox Defender, which covers my iPhone 5S work phone. It does not have the rubbery feel of the Otterbox. It is more plastic-y. It also provides a much slimmer silhouette than the Otterbox. The fit and finish reflect quality. I am very happy with the Unicorn Beetle SUPCASE. It is more than likely the best case you can get for the money. I will definitely buy another when I upgrade to the iPhone 6 or 6+
customer_reviews.author: S. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Like the case but.....
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this case and belt clip as long as it lasted. After a few months the belt clip broke and will not hold the phone. I contacted Supcase to see if I could buy a replacement belt clip. They are not available for purchase apparently. To Supcase's credit, they did refund me $5.00. Bought a leather belt holster to carry the phone, but not too happy with it. I would much prefer Supcase had a replacement belt clip to purchase. Still using the case. The screen protector is not real clear, but works alright for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carlitos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case and protection for half the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case that fits very snug! Half the price of an Ottorbox with great protection. I'd buy it again. It's also not incredibly bulky. I actually use mine in a professional business setting so it has to be a nice line between sleek and protection. The only reason I didn't give it 5 starts was the cover for the silent button never worked correctly. I tried and tied and even shaved down some of the plastic. Eventually I cut it off. Still looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Strider

customer_reviews.title: Great duty case
customer_reviews.text: This case is for my husband's new iPhone 5S. He had dropped his 5C enough times that we had spent $300 on new screens! So we both said 'forget this', got him a brand NEW phone and THIS case. Let me tell you, he LOVES IT. He said he's dropped his phone a few times and everything is still going great. He doesn't use the clip because the phone fits perfectly in one of his tactical pants pockets. I couldn't even figure out for the get the case apart at first so I knew it would be a good case.
customer_reviews.author: A. Knollhuff

customer_reviews.title: I really like the case itself as far as how rugged it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case itself as far as how rugged it is. There is only one downfall that I see, but it was not indicated in the description before I purchased. There is a cut-out for the iPhone home button. I would have preferred to have this like previous cases I have purchased where that is not a cutout, but rather has a lighter film over the button, so the dirt does not accumulate under the clear screen protector. I have had cases before with the cutout for the home button, and dirt ALWAYS accumulates under the clear screen protector from this area. Aside from this, I am quite pleased with the case.
customer_reviews.author: TwM

customer_reviews.title: Great cases, I've gotten three (three different devices) and loved everyone
customer_reviews.text: I like these cases, I've got one on my phone, tablet, and kindle. They're cheap, they look good, and are sturdy; plus now all my technology matches which is cool. The only thing I don't like about them is the screen protector has little dots across it in a pattern, I guess something in how they manufacture it does this. It's not visible unless you get a glare on the case but it causes the screen to need to be wiped off a lot more than other cases/screen protectors I've used need o.
customer_reviews.author: Travis White

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: This case seems like it would provide a lot of protection without being too bulky, and it is reasonably priced. The iPhone 5S touch screen works fine for me with the screen cover. One complaint I have is that the cover for the silencer switch will not stay closed. Does anyone have a fix for this? Also, the black case doesn't look very good on the white phone. I don't really care about how it looks, but some people might want to consider the color before you order it.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Guy

customer_reviews.title: This is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is good for the price. Quality case, but the belt slip needs some work. Currently it is too difficult to get the phone out of the belt case, and the swivel on the belt case is pure plastic. So, it is tough to rotate at first, and eventually it will wear down to being too easy to rotate. EDIT - Belt clip broken beyond repair after 5 months of use. The plastic part that holds the phone in place just broke after normal usage. Phone case holds up well, belt clip does not.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: Ok admittedly I was looking for a waterproof case because that is what I typed into the search bar. When I saw this, I thought that it looked pretty good. I bought it, and noticed how it is totally not waterproof. Wah Wah. I gave the case a shot anyways. Turns out it is still a good case anyways. Very sturdy, light, thin, and a bit tough. After a few months, a piece broke off where the mute switch was, leaving the cover sticking out. So I cut off the cover and broke off the broken plastic entirely. I still use the case because it is still good for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Humandelta38

customer_reviews.title: No warranty contrary to claim from reseller.
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to have a warranty. That is a lie. I was offer a few $$$ refund after the belt clip broke. The phone case is great, but the belt clip breaks. The warranty simply isn't. A warranty implies replacing a defective or broken item. The best is an offer of a few $$$. Make sure to read the reviews here first. You might get more $$$ back based on what others report. Again, this item has no warranty at all. If it breaks, too bad.
customer_reviews.author: DataHaunt

customer_reviews.title: SUPERCASE
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. Belt clip is strong and the phone stays firmly in place, it is also light weight and not bulky either. This is 100% better than any Otter-box I have ever owned. The case does not get all stretched out either. Just received my case in the mail. Super fast shipping and very happy with the product The case is great! Wasn't hard to open and was definitely a snug fit in my iPhone 5s. It feels tough but light, and the belt clip loosens up to enable one-handed use.
customer_reviews.author: Deac73

customer_reviews.title: 5+ stars " the best case I have had " I love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say upfront that I'm a otter box guy. I have had them when they were just made for boating and diving. I'm talking big cases for lot of stuff. Anyhow I had got the unicorn Beatle case for my IPad and I love it. So when I just got myself the new iPhone I decided to go with the same brand. What a frigging great case. Thin. Lightweight, rugged and well made. This is by far the best case I have had period! 5+ stars. The picture is only the by clip. The phone is in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Scott

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy! Works great! My husband has a habit of breaking his phone. Had no issues with this! His only complaint is it’s slightly bulky. In comparison to other cases though, it’s not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Kady

customer_reviews.title: not much of a screen protector-cracked after 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Case fits nicely but my husband used it for 1 1⁄2 months and it slipped off the tray in the car and the screen is cracked. It's not real bad, but he just got the phone and it's frustrating because I really researched cases to find one that would protect it. Belt clip works nicely and hasn't broken, like some other reviewers have said. I haven't contacted seller yet. Hope they will be more responsive than in the past for other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy L

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty & Effective
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! This case is durable, heavy duty, and withstands falls on hard surfaces (tile, cement) with no damage. It fits very well around my iPhone 5, even over the tempered glass I put on the phone itself. The rubber grip on this case is an improvement also, as most other materials simply slide right out of a pocket or purse. Simple, small, and streamlined design. The additional belt clip on is removable, although some users might appreciate it. Easy to use, fits well, does not block sound or necessary buttons on the phone, merely covers them for protection and enables use throughout. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Mic doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Video is great but the mic doesn't work, which is why I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best friggin case ever.
customer_reviews.text: So I was out riding my bicycle and I have a plastic handle bar mount for my phone so I can keep track of my speed and distance. I was riding close to 20 mph when I hit an emeffing bump and the cheep piece of s*** mount broke and my phone went flying off! It hit the pavement hard, did a couple of tumbles,and then landed on the screen before it slid across the pavement into the grave. I thought well I'm boned. I picked up the phone and took the case off to inspect it. Guess what? It was fine. Not one scratch or crack. This case is very durable. I suggest you buy the emeffing thing already.
customer_reviews.author: Frogmouth77

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Nice retail package, no damage. Allows the iPhone 5s to retain a slender feel. Screen saver integrated ( mostly why I ordered this item) but it allows fine lint between it and screen. This distorted viewing a bit, hence 4 stars. Not rubbery nor too slick a texture; slides in / out of pocket well. Belt holster, I won't use, so no words on that. Overall I like the product, will recommend to others. Note: haven't dropped yet, so can't score that.
customer_reviews.author: Grunt344

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Otter Box
customer_reviews.text: I scratch the plastic screen cover on my Otter Box and discovered that I had to buy a whole new case instead of the screen. The Otter was a good case and I'd had it for some time. I chose this case because it was much cheaper than the Otter Box. (low $20 range). I was surprised to find that it's tough, nice looking, and a good bit smaller than the Otter. I have an iPhone 5s. Does everything I would want
customer_reviews.author: Luke Skywalker

product_meta.title: BaByliss Straight and Curl Brilliance Hair Straightener
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Straight and Curl BrillianceThe super-polished true titanium plates glide through the hair effortlessly with fast-action heat transfer for quick long-lasting styling. The ultra smooth stainless steel curved outer housing makes creating curls and waves easy. Frizz taming Ionics ensures a smooth finish every time.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Straightener; 1 x Heat Mat; 2 x Rubber tip covers; 1 x Instruction booklet
feature_bullets: Stainless steel curved housing for creating perfectly smooth curls easily
Extra-long true-titanium plates for easy glide
Advanced Ceramics to maintain constant high heat whilst in use
Smoothing ionic conditioners for frizz-free hair

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars272 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
